channel.title: Strive for excellence
channel.description: Recent content on Strive for excellence

item.title: About Me
item.description: About me Hi there, I’m Benjamin, a software engineer in China. I work on iOS development üì± mainly. And I’m on my way to full-stack engineer üöÄ, which is cool üòé. In this place, I’d like to share things (tech stuff, opinions, stories or whatever).

item.title: A Look Back At 2020
item.description: 2020 was tough for many, and for me as well. (Photo by Colton Sturgeon) A couple of days ago, in December 31 at night, I finished the brief review of my 2020 and sent it to Ts, a friend I met on a hike back in 2017. Ts would then make it part of the yearly collection of reviews. There would be about 40 of them, all collected from his friends.

item.title: My First IELTS (Academic) Test
item.description: (Photo by Jenny Pace) I had my first IELTS test last month. Here is the result: Listening Reading Writing Speaking 7.5 8 6 5 So, writing and speaking are my weak points. This time I hadn’t spended much time preparing for writing and speaking tests. Actually, 6 is beyond my expectation. My expectation for writing was 4~5 before I handed in the answer sheets.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: First of all, a resolution! This is my fifth time rebuilding this blog ü§¶üèª. Hopefully, I will manage to write regularly in the coming years.
